alert.note: Alert for Newcastle; Northern Campbell; Southern Campbell; Western Crook; Weston County Plains; Wyoming Black Hills (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued January 18 at 1:21AM MST until January 19 at 9:00AM MST by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 5 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 9 AM MST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Very cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 30 below zero. * WHERE...Portions of southwestern South Dakota and northeast Wyoming. This includes the Tribal Lands of the Pine Ridge Reservation. * WHEN...From 5 PM this afternoon to 9 AM MST Friday. * IMPACTS...The cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes.
info.instruction: A wind chill advisory means the combination of wind and cold temperatures will create dangerously low wind chill values. If you go outside, cover all parts of your body, especially your head, face, and hands.

area.areaDesc: Newcastle; Northern Campbell; Southern Campbell; Western Crook; Weston County Plains; Wyoming Black Hills
